name: Retro Kart
description:
Retro Kart is an arcade race offline and online, where you can blow your enemies to smithereens in the "Crusher" mode, where the main task is to destroy as many cars as possible, ramming them to a chic soundtrack that you can add yourself and enjoy the chic view of the stylized RetroWave style tracks or play standard race modes like "Circle Riding" and "Time Riding"
Game genre: Racing
Game style: RetroWave
Game Modes: "Round Robin", "Time Riding", "Destroyer (mode where players destroy each other's cars)
